message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's worth a significant amount, and I'm starting the bidding at $14,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is my minimum asking price.  To move this forward, would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12,000?

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. While I understand the value of the product, I am unable to meet at $12,000. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we perhaps meet closer to my maximum price?
